channel.title: [317] Donator Points Won't Work
channel.description:
My server already has a donator shop and a spot on the quest tab to display the points a player has, but when I tested to see if it works, the points I spend to buy in the shop don't subtract from what I have displayed on the quest tab.
Any help is appreciated, I'm no java expert

item.title: [317] Donator Points Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @pur3ph33r pur3ph33r
item.description:
@pur3ph33r wrote:

I don’t know how to connect the points tab with the subtractions of points or make it refresh…

Read full topic
